posts.post_content:
Seen this out on turn 3  
  
Turn 1: Forest, [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves) 2 mana  
Turn 2: Mountain, [Thornscape Familiar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thornscape Familiar) effectively 4 mana for red/white spells  
Turn 3: Any mana producing land: This guy, return Llanowar elves  
  
Opponents proceed to panic unless they have removal or counters within 3 turns of this being out (bring out counter creatures is usually a bad answer cos said deck may have burn spells to kill them)  
  
5/5
